contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Inviting and comfortable, the organic cotton Boyfriend Fleece Crew is made in a heavyweight composition to keep you in your everyday comfort zone. Durable and flexible, they are made to go out, WFH or lounge away!
contentfulProduct.title: Organic Heavyweight Boyfriend Crew

content.value: Complete your look with a Heavyweight Fleece Bottom & save $5

Inviting and comfortable, the organic cotton Boyfriend Fleece Crew is made in a heavyweight composition to keep you in your everyday comfort zone. Durable and flexible, they are made to go out, WFH or lounge away!
Material: 100% organic cotton 375g heavyweight fleece
Custom fabric process for a butter-soft feel both inside and out
High quality rib at neck, sleeve, and waist openings
Raglan sleeve construction for a wider range of movement
Overlock stitching at sleeve seam for added durability
Certified organic cotton fiber. Organic fibers aren't treated with pesticides, insecticides, or herbicides, and conserve more natural resources like water
Origin: Ningbo, China
Model is 5'8" and wearing a size Small
Machine wash cool using mild laundry detergent. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Material: 100% organic cotton 375g heavyweight fleece
  • Custom fabric process for a butter-soft feel both inside and out
  • High quality rib at neck, sleeve, and waist openings
  • Raglan sleeve construction for a wider range of movement
  • Overlock stitching at sleeve seam for added durability
  • Certified organic cotton fiber. Organic fibers aren't treated with pesticides, insecticides, or herbicides, and conserve more natural resources like water
  • Origin: Ningbo, China
  • Model is 5'8" and wearing a size Small

content.value: "Quinces new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality youre getting."
